-----------------------Backup----------------------------------- Data Backup Last Backup Back up your data to Google Drive. You can restore them when you reinstall Buckoid App and signin with Google Account. We strongly recommend that you take backup regularly from the app (as backup to Google Drive is not automatic). Doing so would keep your data safe even if your device is lost/damaged. Google Drive Setting Transaction details backed up in Google Drive are not protected by Buckoid end-to-end encryption. Google Account
